command: az ad user create --display-name "Alex Morgan" --user-principal-name alex.morgan@contoso.onmicrosoft.com --password 'S3cureTemp!23' --force-change-password-next-sign-in false --output json
explanation: Establishes an Azure AD user to act as a persona with a stable password and natural-looking profile details.
rationale_steps: Select a realistic display name and UPN
Provision an Azure AD account for cloud persona presence
Disable forced password change to maintain persistence
